name: Paint by Number: Art Painting
description:
The #1 Anti-stress Game! Relax by Painting!

Choose from a huge selection of images such as flowers, animals, mandalas, beautiful art works, unicorns and more! You can also play with your kids!

Key Features:
- Many color pages with tons of themed categories
- Simple and easy to operate
- New images added WEEKLY
- Offline support, no internet required after you finish downloading the new images

How to play:
- Choose the image that you want to paint
- Choose the color according to the numbers shown in the picture. Coloring has never been so easy!
- Collect your favorite artworks by clicking the “like” button, check them out anytime you like
Post your artworks on social networks or send them to your friends

Crash, Freeze, Bugs, Comments, Feedback?
Feel free to drop us a line at https://www.shakeitmediainc.com/contact-us/

Your use of this application is governed by the Terms of Service available at https://www.shakeitmediainc.net/terms-of-use/.
Collection and use of your data are subject to the Privacy Policy available at https://www.shakeitmediainc.net/privacy-policy/.

Important Message for Purchases:
- By downloading this App you agree to Unicorn Chef’s Privacy Policy
- Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
